original: @86a * // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @86a * // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'a lam ba na pa r'akshi /
analyzed: a'a lam ba na pa r'akshi /
translated: ƒÄlambanaparƒ´k·π£ƒÅ

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dmigs pa brtag pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa brtag pa /
translated: The Examination of the Object

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: dbang po rnam par rig pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: dbang po rnam par rig pa'i rgyu //
translated: The cause of the awareness of the senses

original: phra rab rdul dag yin mod kyi //
analyzed: phra rab rdul dag yin mod kyi //
translated: Is the subtle particles.

original: der mi snang phyir de'i yul ni //
analyzed: der mi snang phyir de'i yul ni //
translated: But since they are not perceived,

original: rdul phran ma yin dbang po bzhin ;
analyzed: rdul phran ma yin dbang po bzhin ;
translated: The object is not the subtle particles, just like the senses.

original: / gang ltar snang de de las min //
analyzed: / gang ltar snang de de las min //
translated: What appears is not from that,

original: rdzas su med phyir zla gnyis bzhin //
analyzed: rdzas su med phyir zla gnyis bzhin //
translated: Because it does not exist as a substance, like the two moons.

original: de ltar phyi rol gnyis ka yang //
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol gnyis ka yang //
translated: Thus, both external objects

original: blo yi yul du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: blo yi yul du mi rung ngo //
translated: Are not suitable as objects of the mind.üîΩSome assert that the aspect of the collection

original: kha cig 'dus pa'i rnam pa dag / sgrub pa yin par 'dod par byed //
analyzed: kha cig 'dus pa'i rnam pa dag / sgrub pa yin par 'dod par byed //
translated: Is the establishment.

original: rdul phran rnam pa rnam rig gi / don min sra nyid la sogs bzhin //
analyzed: rdul phran rnam pa rnam rig gi / don min sra nyid la sogs bzhin //
translated: The subtle particles are not the object of awareness, like solidity, etc.üîΩIn that case, the awareness of a pot

original: de dag ltar na bum pa dang // kham phor sogs blo mtshungs par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag ltar na bum pa dang // kham phor sogs blo mtshungs par 'gyur //
translated: And a plate, etc., would be the same.

original: gal te rnam pa'i dbye bas dbye //
analyzed: gal te rnam pa'i dbye bas dbye //
translated: If it is differentiated by the differentiation of the aspect,

original: de ni rdul phran rdzas yod la //
analyzed: de ni rdul phran rdzas yod la //
translated: That is the substantial existence of the subtle particles.

original: med de tshad dbye med phyir ro //
analyzed: med de tshad dbye med phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no way to measure it.

original: de phyir de rdzas med la yod //
analyzed: de phyir de rdzas med la yod //
translated: Therefore, it exists without substance.

original: rdul phran yongs su bsal na ni //
analyzed: rdul phran yongs su bsal na ni //
translated: When the atoms are removed,

original: der snang shes pa nyams 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: der snang shes pa nyams 'gyur zhing //
translated: The appearance of that object will be lost.

original: nang gi shes bya'i ngo bo ni //
analyzed: nang gi shes bya'i ngo bo ni //
translated: The internal object of cognition

original: phyi rol ltar snang gang yin der //
analyzed: phyi rol ltar snang gang yin der //
translated: Is what appears as if external.

original: don yin rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir //
analyzed: don yin rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir //
translated: Because it is an object, it is the nature of consciousness.

original: de'i rkyen nyid kyang yin phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rkyen nyid kyang yin phyir ro //
translated: It is also a condition of that.

original: gcig cha'ang mi 'khrul phyir na rkyen //
analyzed: gcig cha'ang mi 'khrul phyir na rkyen //
translated: Even though they are simultaneous, they are conditions because they are non-erroneous.

original: nus pa 'jog phyir rim gyis yin //üîΩlhan cig byed dbang nus pa yi //
analyzed: nus pa 'jog phyir rim gyis yin // lhan cig byed dbang nus pa yi //
translated: They are sequential because they are posited as potential.üîΩThe potential that is the nature of the cooperating conditions

original: ngo bo gang yin dbang po'ang yin //
analyzed: ngo bo gang yin dbang po'ang yin //
translated: Is also the sense faculty.

original: de'ang rnam rig la mi 'gal //
analyzed: de'ang rnam rig la mi 'gal //
translated: That is not contradictory for consciousness.üîΩThus, the nature of the objectüîΩAnd its potential are mutually causal,

original: de ltar yul gyi ngo bo dang // nus pa phan tshun rgyu can dang // thogs med dus nas 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar yul gyi ngo bo dang // nus pa phan tshun rgyu can dang // thogs med dus nas 'jug pa yin //
translated: And they operate from beginningless time.

original: dmigs pa brtags pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dmigs pa brtags pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The Examination of the Object of Observation, composed by Master DignƒÅga, is complete.
